alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 8:04PM EDT until July 03 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern New Castle County in northern Delaware... Southeastern Chester County in southeastern Pennsylvania... Central Delaware County in southeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 803 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Westtown, or near West Chester, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Wilmington, West Chester, Westtown, Kennett Square, West Grove, Arden, Cheyney, North Star, Talleyville, Elam, Marshallton, Lima, Chelsea, Radnor Township, Ashland, Gradyville, Greenville, Broomall, Landenberg and Paoli. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 16 and 23. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 5, and between mile markers 11 and 12. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
